product_name: SIGMA SPORT Roadster Front Bike Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Guiding you through the night, the SIGMA SPORT Roadster Front Bike Light offers affordable low-light cycling. Light features a steady and flashing mode that provides 10 hours of run time with the included 2 AA batteries. Special optics create a cone of light that maximizes the brightness of the LED. Exposed on/off switch is easy to use, even with biking gloves. Quick release slide-and-click mounting bracket allows you to remove the SIGMA SPORT Roadster Front Bike Light from the bike if you're running a quick errand at the market. Watertight, extremely durable aluminum housing; tool-free mounting fits 22-32mm bars; horizontally adjustable; 2-stage battery indicator. Closeout.
